==== Ubuntu Women Team ====
* <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2011-August/003327.html|New Ubuntu Women Leadership Team announced]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-52/|Full Circle Magazine, Issue #52]]</nowiki> with article by Karen Rustad about public outreach and diversity in FOSS
* Team meeting <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20110811|August 11th]]</nowiki>
* Cheri Francis began planning <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/CareerDays|Career Days]]</nowiki> events
* Published instructions for getting Ubuntu Women promotional materials made: http://blog.ubuntu-women.org/?p=30
* Laura Czajkowski gave "Life outside of IRC in a FLOSS Community talk" <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2011-August/003331.html|details here]]</nowiki>
* Of the 677 Ubuntu Members at the end of this month 4.73% are women
